body: Both the bf and the gf are scumbags, the boyfriend for almost raping her and the gf for leading him on and then when they're about to fuck she says she loves someone else like what;;
In the tankokon this appears in, School Girl, Souta appears to have another girl waiting for him in the omake. Shame Zukiki went the bestiality route in most of their later stories.

no one deserves rape but idk if the girl deserves to get the happy ending either. she let things get that far while knowing she never loved the guy in the first place. the other guy did love her but ppl call him a "rapist" because he got mad about getting played and he lashed out. the girl never really apologizes or tries to make it better for the guy either. she just goes home and fucks her bro.

@aeronin are you fucking kidding me bro? Do you have any idea how terrifying that is? Having your clothes torn off and having to lie as someone forces themselves upon you. I'd rather fucking die than ever have it happen to me

I would agree with the sentiment that the bf should be pissed, but he obviously didn't rape her so calling him a rapist isn't accurate and talking about punishment isn't really warranted. At worst he was a bit of a jerk to her but even the girl knew she was the one in the wrong. As for hyperk99's comment, this was NOT a piece of shit and far from disappointing in my opinion! I thought it was really well done and had a good payoff at the end!
@Rexaz i feel said for the 'rapist' he felt cheated and he stopped right at the start anyway. i'd be pretty pissed too if my partner was using me to get away from liking their sibling

this is piece of piece of sh1t
really dissapointing
Kinda peeved the attempted rapist didn't get any punishment in the end.
